meta.description: Maximize the amount of sand delivered using small and large containers with constraints on personnel and container usage.

sets.name: CONTAINERS
sets.description: Types of containers used for sand delivery

params.name: people_required
params.description: Number of people required to unload each type of container

params.name: sand_capacity
params.description: Amount of sand each type of container can hold

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of container used

objective.name: max_sand_delivery
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of sand delivered

constraints.name: personnel_limit
constraints.description: Limit on the number of people available to unload containers

constraints.name: small_large_ratio
constraints.description: The number of small containers must be thrice the number of large containers

constraints.name: min_small_containers
constraints.description: At least 5 small containers must be used

constraints.name: min_large_containers
constraints.description: At least 3 large containers must be used
